sources.title: Follow Your Heart
sources.description: Title: Follow Your Heart Summary: An eccentric musical family is kept in order by a talented daughter with modest ambitions. Directed by: Aubrey Scotto Actors: Marion Talley, Michael Bartlett, Nigel Bruce Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 11 August 1936 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 An eccentric musical family is kept in order by a talented daughter with modest ambitions.

sources.title: Follow Your Heart (1936) DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: Marion Talley, Michael Bartlett, Nigel Bruce
 Director: Aubrey Scotto

 An eccentric musical family is kept in order by a talented daughter with modest ambitions. Stars Kansas-born Metropolitan Opera diva Marion Talley.
